content: That's really helpful, thank you! I'll definitely check out some of those studios and classes. I've been trying to prioritize my physical and mental health since moving to Tokyo, and yoga has been a great way for me to relax and unwind. By the way, do you have any recommendations for good hiking trails or outdoor activities in the Tokyo area? I've been wanting to explore more of the natural side of Japan, but I'm not sure where to start.
